section.name: Description
section.p: What flashes in the mind when someone speaks about 'Success'? Success. It is not an inventory where we purchase by giving money. May it be success in studies, sports, business, relationships or any other thing. It needs hard work, dedication and commitment.

Being a successful employee is no different fact. If you are employed, it means you are selling your services to the organisation. Your Organisation is your customer. You are owner of the product, named service. But then where is your selesperson? Its your attitude, behaavior, communication that helps you sell your service.
The view is completely changed There are many tools which provide the functionality. But they COST and provide many other features which might not be necessary for your requirement.

p.ol:
Said that, lets look at the job as an employer. Here:
You are the employer.
Product is your services.
Customer is your organisation.
Your manager is the person who interact between you and the organisation.
Your salespersons are your behavioral characteristics.
